/.title: Dr. John P. Krasting - Climate Scientist | Sea Level Rise Expert
/.description: Climate scientist at NOAA GFDL specializing in sea level rise and ocean dynamics. Published in Nature journals and PNAS.

/about.title: About Dr. John P. Krasting - Climate Scientist at NOAA GFDL
/about.description: Climate scientist and ocean modeler at NOAA GFDL. Leading sea level rise research, Earth system model development, and process-oriented diagnostics.

/research.title: Research - Sea Level Rise, Ocean Dynamics, Climate Modeling | Dr. John P. Krasting
/research.description: Research on sea level rise, ocean circulation, carbon cycle, Earth system models, and model diagnostics. Leading sea level prediction projects at NOAA GFDL.

/research/sea-level-rise.title: Sea Level Rise & Coastal Impacts Research | Dr. John P. Krasting
/research/sea-level-rise.description: Leading research on regional sea level projections, steric sea level changes, and coastal inundation. Published in Nature Geoscience and Journal of Climate.

/research/ocean-dynamics.title: Ocean Dynamics & Circulation Research | Dr. John P. Krasting
/research/ocean-dynamics.description: Expert in ocean circulation, water mass transformation, Antarctic Slope Current, and AMOC dynamics. Advancing understanding of ocean's role in climate change.

/research/carbon-cycle.title: Carbon Cycle & Biogeochemistry Research | Dr. John P. Krasting
/research/carbon-cycle.description: Research on ocean carbon uptake, acidification, and transient climate response to emissions. Published in PNAS and Annual Review of Earth and Planetary Sciences.

/research/esm-development.title: Earth System Model Development | Dr. John P. Krasting
/research/esm-development.description: Core developer of GFDL CM4, ESM4, CM5, and OM5 climate models used in IPCC assessments. Leading climate model diagnostics and evaluation efforts.

/research/model-diagnostics.title: Model Diagnostics & Evaluation Research | Dr. John P. Krasting
/research/model-diagnostics.description: Co-lead of NOAA Model Diagnostics Task Force developing process-oriented diagnostics for climate models. Securing competitive funding for diagnostic framework development.

/publications.title: Publications - Peer-Reviewed Research | Dr. John P. Krasting
/publications.description: Peer-reviewed publications on sea level rise, ocean dynamics, and climate modeling in Nature Geoscience, Nature Climate Change, PNAS, and other leading journals.

/teaching.title: Teaching & Mentoring | Dr. John P. Krasting
/teaching.description: Teaching climate science at Princeton and Rutgers. Mentoring postdocs and undergraduates through competitive research programs. Hands-on climate modeling approach.

/cv.description: Complete CV for Dr. John P. Krasting: publications, funding, awards, teaching, mentoring, and service. Download PDF for tenure review and collaboration inquiries.
